title: Soap spoilers: Who dies in EastEnders, Coronation Street and Emmerdale?
text:
It’s October so that means only one thing aside from being able to see our breath in the morning and lots of Halloween sweets – yes, everyone is about to die in the soaps! Tragedy strikes as deaths are confirmed in both EastEnders and Coronation Street while Emmerdale airs a dramatic stunt that looks set to add to the death toll – is Cain Dingle (Jeff Hordley) set to become a killer?

Elsewhere, Hollyoaks is hinting at more tragedy as the wheels are set in motion for the catastrophic autumn spectacular – as Cindy Cunningham (Stephanie Waring) ignores a pretty big safety warning. Uh oh…

Here are the killer spoilers to come:

EastEnders

As Ben tightens his control over Martin, he confides in Kush and the friends hatch a plan to bring Ben down. But as Ben sets out to prove that he is not one to be messed with, things between him and Martin reach breaking point and Martin is in serious danger.

Jay is given a new funeral to arrange and he and Callum are taken aback by the demands from the family. Jay is taken aback when he finds out that the deceased is Terry Bates, the man who killed his dad Jase. Vowing to expose him for what he was, what is Jay planning?

Whitney is gutted when her stall is vandalised but Leo steps in to help her. However, Callum is soon left suspecting that Leo is not all that he seems and Leo fears that he could get in the way of his plan. Later, Whitney makes an admission.

Advertisement

Advertisement

Coronation Street

As a prison riot gets underway, Abe encourages David to carry out his revenge against Josh. Amid the violence, David insists that he will deal out justice in his own way. Things take a dark turn when Josh is then stabbed and left for dead.

As Sinead deteroriates, she stirs in her bed to see her loved ones gathered around her and Dr Gaddas confirms that it’s too late to move her now – the end is nigh. Daniel siezes the opportunity to spend some emotional final moments with his beloved wife.

Gail returns from Thailand and wants to pull her family together with yoga – but it looks like it’s going to take a lot more than that.

Emmerdale

Cain lures Nate and Moira onto a boat trip but before long, he is confronting Nate over his affair with Moira. As Nate gets confrontational, Cain attacks him and they end up in a fight of life or death. In the melee, Moira falls from the boat and finds herself trapped among the weeds. Meanwhile, an explosion rips through the boat, leaving everyone fighting for their lives.

On the day of the Woolpack re-opening, Chas and Marlon get stuck in the loos when the lock breaks. Chas’ waters break and she is left in a panic that she only has Marlon’s help as she goes into labour. Marlon and Chas’ shouts can’t be heard over the music so Marlon makes her a makeshift bed and helps her through the process. As she wills Paddy to arrive, she gives birth to their baby.

Mandy and Vinny are delighted when their scam to get their hands on Lydia’s inheritance comes together but they are thrown when someone comes round to discuss the money – can they get Lydia out of the way?

Advertisement

Advertisement

Hollyoaks

(Picture: Lime Pictures)

With Tony missing, his dad Edward turns up and wants to be there for Diane as she tries to get her head around everything. He is soon charming the locals and proving supportive – but Finn is instantly suspicious of his true motives.

(Picture: Lime Pictures)

Cindy hires Woody to get to work on her new building project and she ignores warnings about the unstable underground passage. Tom is frustrated that she seems to have just hired Woody for his looks and sets out to intervene.

(Picture: Lime Pictures)

Darren is put out by everyone fawning over Edward and so he plans a surprise for a delighted Mandy to prove that he can be impulsive and romantic. As he sweeps her off her feet, will he prove the point he is trying to make?

Plus! (Credit: BBC) Gray reveals the news of Chantelle’s pregnancy in EastEnders.

Breda is forced to see a therapist in Hollyoaks.

Bethany feels tormented after getting too close to Daniel in Coronation Street.

Lisa iis jealous of Louise’s bond with Mel in EastEnders.

Pete finds himself in danger from Cain in Emmerdale.

Max returns home to Shona in Coronation Street.

Luke has a business proposition for Ollie in Hollyoaks.

Paddy and Chas decide on a baby name in Emmerdale.

Advertisement Advertisement
description: A deadly set of events rocks the world of soap.
